tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  item_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  usage_data JSONB NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_supplies (
  supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_name VARCHAR(50),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  last_usage_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_location VARCHAR(50),
  supply_id INT,
  usage_count INT,
  last_recorded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_supplies (
    supply_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name STRING,
    quantity INT,
    location STRING,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE iot_sensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_location STRING,
    sensor_type STRING,
    installation_date DATE,
    battery_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  value DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE usage_data (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  sensor_id INT,
  quantity_used INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
